posTolerance.comment: Dist [mm] - distance between destination and current pos when positioning is considered done.

moveSpeedThreshold.comment: Vel [m/s] - max velocity of bot when positining is considered done

destFreeTol.comment: Dist [mm] - Distance between two bots up to which they are considered to conflict each other in position

rotSpeedTolerance.comment: Tol [rad/s] - when below, rotation is considered to be done

angleTolerance.comment: Tol [rad] - this tolerance value is used to check if the viewing direction of the bot is correct.
